Articles.Content:
Post your avatars!

Before this was a MS paint avatars thread but now it's a all avatars thread!

MS paint avatars are still accepted.

So post them now!

![deqOsZS.png](http://i.imgur.com/deqOsZS.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-04T18:58:00Z" title="04/04/2015 06:58  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 4, 2015</time> by Mad Rocket Scientist**

I made mine in Autodesk Sketchbook. Would that count?

![F0DU9z2.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/F0DU9z2.jpg)

> 
> I made mine in Autodesk Sketchbook. Would that count?

Of course it counts! Very nice work!

![pDGgCHR.png](http://imgur.com/pDGgCHR.png)

Decided to try to make mine. So far it is coming along well, though I still have to add the structure (shouldn't be too hard) and the NAFA-18 Caracal (which I probably won't do).)

I just made mine in gimp and I also changed my signature too.

![lkLyQyW.png](http://i.imgur.com/lkLyQyW.png)

> 
> [http://imgur.com/pDGgCHR.png](http://imgur.com/pDGgCHR.png)
> Decided to try to make mine. So far it is coming along well, though I still have to add the structure (shouldn't be too hard) and the NAFA-18 Caracal (which I probably won't do).)

> 
> I just made mine in gimp and I also changed my signature too.
> [http://i.imgur.com/lkLyQyW.png](http://i.imgur.com/lkLyQyW.png)

Those both look very nice!

I think I captured the manic look my avatar kerbal has.

[![v2cz2ZS.png?2](http://i.imgur.com/v2cz2ZS.png?2)](http://imgur.com/v2cz2ZS)

Yep, the hat is poking through the helmet.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-02T01:26:41Z" title="04/02/2015 01:26  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 2, 2015</time> by Tw1**

> 
> Of course it counts! Very nice work!

Oh, thanks! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Slight bump:

Now for all avatars.
I don't have one yet, I can't decide on what would be fitting...

The original screenshot I took mine from:

![t0Z7I32.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/t0Z7I32.jpg)

> 
> The original screenshot I took mine from:
> [http://i.imgur.com/t0Z7I32.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/t0Z7I32.jpg)

The kerbal looks half scared and half amazed
Finally got around to making an avatar. ![random_by_i_phillip-d8oqcvd.jpg](http://img13.deviantart.net/a192/i/2015/096/1/b/random_by_i_phillip-d8oqcvd.jpg)

![FLR8pal.png](http://i.imgur.com/FLR8pal.png)

Plot twist: that rocket isn't exploding! What you're seeing is a really, really, really bad attempt at creating a dramatic lens flare of the sun in front of a spacecraft sitting on top of the launchpad. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) I would update my avatar, but it's grown on me too much!

The Original. (Now it's transparent. And smaller.)

![QnrBFSP.png](http://i.imgur.com/QnrBFSP.png)

My avatar is related to my screen name; **Rematog**. The pic is from the original "Atog" card in Magic the Gathering.... from around '93. I had custom license plate **ATOG** on my RX-7 in the 90's when I lived in Vegas.

![10400053_10202004714039591_3777803540302558783_n.jpg?oh=d2d57fe419a1019339cb7c8c157c576e&oe=55B2CB85](https://scontent-dfw.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xfa1/v/t1.0-9/10400053_10202004714039591_3777803540302558783_n.jpg?oh=d2d57fe419a1019339cb7c8c157c576e&oe=55B2CB85)

Mine is a shot of a Christmas tree ornament I made myself, with colored modeling clay. I know it's not the greatest, but I have Jeb on my tree and you probably don't ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-10T20:38:02Z" title="04/10/2015 08:38  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 10, 2015</time> by Mister Dilsby**

Mine comes from a coyote themed wallpaper I did a long while ago in Inkscape (my signature will probably let you deduce that I'm a big fan of a certain canidae cartoon character ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)).

It's just a coyote bitmap that I traced into a vector using Inkscape, a moon crescent and some gradient, but I liked it as a simple, smooth wallpaper and kept using the coyote *sans* the shadow as my avatar.

![BmhuyYQ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/BmhuyYQ.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-10T13:53:45Z" title="04/10/2015 01:53  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 10, 2015</time> by el\_coyoto**

Here we go:

![scientist-with-beaker-109304.png](http://images.vectorhq.com/images/previews/410/scientist-with-beaker-109304.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-10T22:30:33Z" title="04/10/2015 10:30  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 10, 2015</time> by Mad Rocket Scientist**

![cuC3dOJ.png](http://i.imgur.com/cuC3dOJ.png)

***WE ARE YOUR GENETIC DESTINY***

Sadly, it's too late to make my username "cuttleReaper". ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-12T15:52:03Z" title="04/12/2015 03:52  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 12, 2015</time> by ninenineninefour**
I made mine in Microsoft Word because it has more shapes than Microsoft Paint ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![wczqJLB.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/wczqJLB.jpg)

Kinda inspired by the [Certification Point icon](http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/planetside2/images/0/0b/Icon_resource_certpoints_128.png) from Planetside 2, made in GIMP. I'm also working on some overlays for when I get back to livestreaming in May.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-18T16:53:47Z" title="04/18/2015 04:53  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 18, 2015</time> by OrbitusII**

Since the old thread by Mad Rocket Scientist got.. well.. old. I'd figured I'd start a new thread.

We often never get to be able to see others' avatars in full scale and a story behind how it was made, so whether it's hand-drawn, a typical picture or a photograph of yourself, showcase it here! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I just updated mine today - It's the Space Shuttle Endeavour mounted on the B747-100 Shuttle Carrier Aircraft. I took a base image, traced it with Autodesk Sketchbook, and shaded it similarly to look more "animated."

Here it is - I'm rather proud of it:

![YJclWOA.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/YJclWOA.jpg)

What about you guys?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-30T05:17:30Z" title="06/30/2015 05:17  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 30, 2015</time> by Columbia**

Mine is this:

![j1MAmSy.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/j1MAmSy.jpg)

I'm always looking for new Mad Scientist like images, before this I used Valentina Tershakova.

![valentina_kerman_by_y0rshee-d8nzqg0.png](http://orig00.deviantart.net/418a/f/2015/091/9/7/valentina_kerman_by_y0rshee-d8nzqg0.png)

Mine's this fanart I drew. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
